public java.lang.String getRegistration(org.springframework.ui.Model model)

      • getRegistrationConfirmationNeeded

        @GetMapping(params="uuid")
public java.lang.String getRegistrationConfirmationNeeded(@RequestParam(name="uuid")
                                                                                      java.lang.String uuid,
                                                                                      org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                                                                      org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                      java.util.Locale locale)
        After registration process in postRegistration(UserDto, BindingResult, Model, Locale) receives the newly-created Uuid. If it is valid shows the 'userMessage' to follow the link from their email to activate their account. If not just redirects to the '/registration' page.
        Parameters:
        uuid -
        redirectAttributes -
        model -
        locale -
        Returns:

      • postRegistration

        @PostMapping
public java.lang.String postRegistration(@Validated(value=Persist.class) @ModelAttribute(name="userDto")
                                                       UserDto userDto,
                                                       org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                       org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                       java.util.Locale locale)
        Receives the UserDto to be registered. If valid persists new non-enabled User with the linked appropriate Uuid and returns the '/registration' page with the 'uuid' parameter.
        Parameters:
        userDto - UserDto object to be evaluated for being persisted.
        bindingResult - Will be returned if UserDto contains FieldErrors
